mapper.select: select c.category, c.title, TO_CHAR(c.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') reg_date , c.read_count, c.like_count, c.member_id, c.content, (select count(*) from community_comment where community_no = c.community_no) comment_count, (select m.nickname from member m where c.member_id = m.id) nickname from community c where c.community_no = #{no}

select c.content, c.reg_date, c.writer, m.nickname, c.is_parent, c.no from community_comment c join member m on m.id = c.writer where c.delete_yn = 'N' and c.community_no = #{no} and c.comment_level = 1 order by c.reg_date
select content, reg_date, writer, comment_ref from community_comment where delete_yn = 'N' and comment_ref = #{ref} and comment_level = 2 order by reg_date
select no, original_filename, renamed_filename, community_no from community_attachment where community_no = #{no} order by reg_date
mapper.update: update community set delete_yn = 'Y' where community_no = #{communiy_no}
update community set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, category = #{category}, member_id = #{memberId} where community_no = #{no}
mapper.select: select community_no, category, title, (select m.nickname from member m where c.member_id = m.id) nickname, reg_date, read_count, like_count from community c order by reg_date
